It logs the report request, calculates various energy metrics (cost, demand, usage, and mmBTU), and aggregates these metrics at different organizational levels. The results are returned in a structured format, providing insights into energy consumption and costs for the specified agency and period.

The procedure involves multiple steps, including logging, data retrieval, calculations, and hierarchical data aggregation. It uses temporary tables and joins, which add to its complexity. However, the logic is straightforward and follows a clear sequence of operations.

CREATE  PROCEDURE [Report].[usp_Published_GetMonthlyAgencyDataOnly]
(
	@EmailAddress AS VARCHAR(75), 
	@PublishedBillingPeriod AS VARCHAR(6),
	@AgencyCodeOEC AS VARCHAR(MAX)
)
AS
BEGIN
	SET NOCOUNT ON;
	SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;

    DECLARE @spname AS VARCHAR(100) = OBJECT_NAME(@@PROCID);
    EXEC [Audit].usp_AddReportUsageLog
	    @ReportName					= @spname,
        @StoredProcName				= @spname,
        @RequestedBy				= @EmailAddress,
        @prmPublishedBillingPeriod	= @PublishedBillingPeriod,
        @prmBillingPeriod			= NULL,
        @prmAgency_ies				= @AgencyCodeOEC,
        @prmFacilityNumber_s		= NULL,
        @prmStartingBillingPeriod	= NULL,
        @prmEndingBillingPeriod		= NULL;

    DECLARE @calendarYear VARCHAR(4)

	DECLARE @BillingPeriod VARCHAR(6)= @PublishedBillingPeriod


    SET @calendarYear = SUBSTRING(@PublishedBillingPeriod, 1, 4)
    
    DECLARE @levelIndex AS INT = 3, @mmBTUEleMultiplier AS FLOAT, @mmBTUGasMultiplier AS FLOAT
		,@mmBTUSTMMultiplier AS FLOAT;

    SELECT @mmBTUEleMultiplier = MAX(MMBtusFactor) FROM Factors.ConversionEquivalentsForBtuAndCO2eByBillingPeriod WHERE EnergyDeliveryType = 1 AND BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod;
    SELECT @mmBTUGasMultiplier = MAX(MMBtusFactor) FROM Factors.ConversionEquivalentsForBtuAndCO2eByBillingPeriod WHERE EnergyDeliveryType = 5 AND BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod;
    SELECT @mmBTUSTMMultiplier = MAX(MMBtusFactor) FROM Factors.ConversionEquivalentsForBtuAndCO2eByBillingPeriod WHERE EnergyDeliveryType = 6 AND BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod;
               
    DECLARE @TableReturn TABLE
        (publishedBillingPeriod BillingPeriod,
          BillingPeriod BillingPeriod,
          FiscalYear VARCHAR(4),
          BillingMonth VARCHAR(20),
          AgencyCodeOEC AgencyCodeOEC,
          AgencyName ldesc,
          Cost VARCHAR(30),
          RevisedBilledAmount MONEY, -- general column for both billed amount and usage
	      LevelID INT,
	      ParentAgencyDivisionID int,
	      CostTypeID INT, -- 1=$, 2=KW, 3=KWH, 4=mmBTU
	      IsCostTotal CHAR(1) -- 'N'- not calculated total. Use 'N' to avoid summarize cost twice
        )

    DECLARE @SelectedAgency TABLE
		(agencyLevel INT,
	    agencyDivisionSeqId INT,
	    ParentAgencyDivisionSeqId INT,
	    AgencyDivisionHierarchy HIERARCHYID,
	    AgencyCodeOEC AgencyCodeOEC);

    INSERT INTO @SelectedAgency
        (agencyLevel,
        agencyDivisionSeqId,
        ParentAgencyDivisionSeqId,
		AgencyDivisionHierarchy,
		AgencyCodeOEC)
    SELECT AgencyDivisionHierarchy.GetLevel()
		,AgencyDivisionSeqID
		,ParentAgencyDivisionSeqId
		,AgencyDivisionHierarchy
		,AgencyCodeOEC
    FROM Billing.uftn_TableGetAgencyChildrenByAgencyCodeOEC(@AgencyCodeOEC, @EmailAddress);

    /*
    dollar amount summary Calculation
    */
    INSERT INTO @TableReturn
		(publishedBillingPeriod,
		BillingPeriod,
		FiscalYear,
		BillingMonth,
		AgencyCodeOEC,
		AgencyName,
		Cost,
		RevisedBilledAmount,
		LevelID,
		ParentAgencyDivisionID,
		CostTypeID,
		IsCostTotal)
    SELECT @PublishedBillingPeriod,
		T.BillingPeriod,
        MAX(T.FiscalYear),
        MAX(T.MonthName),
        T.AgencyCodeOEC,
        MAX(T.AgencyName),
        CASE WHEN Energytype = 'ELE' THEN 'Electricity Cost ($)'
                WHEN Energytype = 'GAS' THEN 'Gas Cost ($)'
                WHEN Energytype = 'STM' THEN 'Steam Cost ($)'
        END Cost,
        SUM(T.BilledAmount) AS RevisedBilledAmount,
        MAX(A.AgencyLevel),
        MAX(A.ParentAgencyDivisionSeqId),
        1,
        'N'
    FROM Published.TemporalAccountLevelSummaryByAgency AS T
        INNER JOIN @SelectedAgency AS A ON T.AgencyCodeOEC = A.AgencyCodeOEC
    WHERE T.EffectiveStartPeriod <= @PublishedBillingPeriod AND T.EffectiveEndPeriod > @PublishedBillingPeriod
    GROUP BY T.BillingPeriod,
		T.AgencyCodeOEC,      
		CASE WHEN T.EnergyType = 'ELE' THEN 'Electricity Cost ($)'
				WHEN T.EnergyType = 'GAS' THEN 'Gas Cost ($)'
				WHEN T.EnergyType = 'STM' THEN 'Steam Cost ($)'
		END;

    /*
    KW (electricity deman) summary calculation
    */
    INSERT INTO @TableReturn (publishedBillingPeriod,
		BillingPeriod,
		FiscalYear,
		BillingMonth,
		AgencyCodeOEC,
		AgencyName,
		Cost,
		RevisedBilledAmount,
		LevelID,
		ParentAgencyDivisionID,
		CostTypeID,
		IsCostTotal)
    SELECT @PublishedBillingPeriod,
		T.BillingPeriod,
		MAX(T.FiscalYear),
		MAX(T.MonthName),
		T.AgencyCodeOEC,
		MAX(T.AgencyName),
		CASE WHEN T.EnergyType = 'ELE' THEN 'Electricity Demand (kW)'
			ELSE '' END AS Demand,
		SUM(T.DemandUsage) AS AccountDemandUsage,
		MAX(A.AgencyLevel),
		MAX(A.ParentAgencyDivisionSeqId),
		2,
		'N'
    FROM Published.TemporalAccountLevelSummaryByAgency AS T
        INNER JOIN @SelectedAgency AS A ON T.AgencyCodeOEC = A.AgencyCodeOEC
    WHERE T.EffectiveStartPeriod <= @PublishedBillingPeriod AND T.EffectiveEndPeriod > @PublishedBillingPeriod
		AND EnergyType = 'ELE'
    GROUP BY T.BillingPeriod,
            T.AgencyCodeOEC,
            CASE WHEN Energytype = 'ELE' THEN 'Electricity Demand (kW)'
                ELSE '' END;

    --/*
    --Electricity Usage (kWh) summary calculation
    --*/
    INSERT INTO @TableReturn
        (publishedBillingPeriod,
        BillingPeriod,
        FiscalYear,
        BillingMonth,
        AgencyCodeOEC,
        AgencyName,
        Cost,
        RevisedBilledAmount,
        LevelID,
        ParentAgencyDivisionID,
        CostTypeID,
        IsCostTotal)
    SELECT @PublishedBillingPeriod,
        T.BillingPeriod,
        MAX(T.FiscalYear),
        MAX(T.MonthName),
        T.AgencyCodeOEC,
        MAX(T.AgencyName),
        CASE WHEN T.EnergyType = 'ELE'
            THEN 'Electricity Usage (kWh)'
            WHEN T.EnergyType = 'GAS' THEN 'Gas (Therms)'
            WHEN T.EnergyType = 'STM' THEN 'Steam (MLbs)'
        END AS Usage,
        SUM(T.EnergyUsage) AS AccountEnergyUsage,
        MAX(A.AgencyLevel),
        MAX(A.ParentAgencyDivisionSeqId),
        3,
        'N'
    FROM Published.TemporalAccountLevelSummaryByAgency AS T
        INNER JOIN @SelectedAgency AS A ON T.AgencyCodeOEC = A.AgencyCodeOEC
    WHERE T.EffectiveStartPeriod <= @PublishedBillingPeriod AND T.EffectiveEndPeriod > @PublishedBillingPeriod
    GROUP BY T.BillingPeriod,
        T.AgencyCodeOEC,
        CASE WHEN T.EnergyType = 'ELE' THEN 'Electricity Usage (kWh)'
            WHEN T.EnergyType = 'GAS' THEN 'Gas (Therms)'
            WHEN T.EnergyType = 'STM' THEN 'Steam (MLbs)' END;
                    
    /*
    mmBTU summary calculation
    */
    INSERT INTO @TableReturn
		(publishedBillingPeriod,
        BillingPeriod,
        FiscalYear,
        BillingMonth,
        AgencyCodeOEC,
        AgencyName,
        Cost,
        RevisedBilledAmount,
        LevelID,
        ParentAgencyDivisionID,
        CostTypeID,
        IsCostTotal)
    SELECT @PublishedBillingPeriod,
        T.BillingPeriod,
        MAX(T.FiscalYear),
        MAX(T.MonthName),
        T.AgencyCodeOEC,
        MAX(T.AgencyName),
        'Total Usage (mmBTUs)',
        SUM(CASE WHEN T.EnergyType = 'ELE' THEN T.EnergyUsage * @mmBTUEleMultiplier
            WHEN T.EnergyType = 'GAS' THEN T.EnergyUsage * @mmBTUGasMultiplier
            WHEN T.EnergyType = 'STM' THEN T.EnergyUsage * @mmBTUSTMMultiplier END) AS AccountEnergyUsage,
        MAX(A.AgencyLevel),
        MAX(A.ParentAgencyDivisionSeqId),
        4,
        'N'
    FROM Published.TemporalAccountLevelSummaryByAgency AS T
        INNER JOIN @SelectedAgency AS A ON T.AgencyCodeOEC = A.AgencyCodeOEC
    WHERE T.EffectiveStartPeriod <= @PublishedBillingPeriod AND T.EffectiveEndPeriod > @PublishedBillingPeriod
    GROUP BY T.BillingPeriod, T.AgencyCodeOEC;
		
    /*
    Calculate Total
    */
    INSERT INTO @TableReturn
		(publishedBillingPeriod,
        BillingPeriod,
        FiscalYear,
        BillingMonth,
        AgencyCodeOEC,
        AgencyName,
        Cost,
        RevisedBilledAmount,
        LevelID,
        ParentAgencyDivisionID,
        CostTypeID,
        IsCostTotal)
    SELECT MAX(publishedBillingPeriod), 
		BillingPeriod, 
		MAX(FiscalYear),
		MAX(BillingMonth),
		AgencyCodeOEC,
		MAX(AgencyName),
		CASE WHEN CostTypeID = '1' THEN 'Total Cost ($)' END AS Cost, 
		SUM(RevisedBilledAmount),
		MAX(LevelID),
		MAX(ParentAgencyDivisionID),
		CostTypeID,
		'Y'
	FROM @TableReturn
	WHERE IsCostTotal = 'N' AND CostTypeID  = '1'
	GROUP BY BillingPeriod,
		AgencyCodeOEC,
		CostTypeID;
		
    /*
    Summarize for parent/grandparent 
    */	
    WHILE(@levelIndex > 1)
    BEGIN
	    INSERT INTO @TableReturn
			(publishedBillingPeriod,
			BillingPeriod,
			FiscalYear,
			BillingMonth,
			AgencyCodeOEC,
			AgencyName,
			Cost,
			RevisedBilledAmount,
			LevelID,
			ParentAgencyDivisionID,
			CostTypeID,
			IsCostTotal)
	    SELECT MAX(T.publishedBillingPeriod),
		    T.BillingPeriod,
		    MAX(T.FiscalYear),
		    MAX(T.BillingMonth),
		    MAX(A.AgencyCodeOEC),
		    MAX(A.AgencyName),
		    T.Cost,
		    SUM(T.RevisedBilledAmount),
		    @levelIndex-1,
		    MAX(A.ParentAgencyDivisionSeqId),
		    MAX(T.CostTypeID),
		    T.IsCostTotal
	    FROM @TableReturn AS T
			INNER JOIN Billing.uftn_TableGetAgencyChildrenByAgencyCodeOEC(@AgencyCodeOEC, @EmailAddress) AS A ON T.ParentAgencyDivisionID = A.AgencyDivisionSeqid
	    WHERE T.LevelID = @levelIndex
	    GROUP BY T.BillingPeriod,
		    T.ParentAgencyDivisionID,
		    T.BillingPeriod,
		    T.Cost,
		    T.IsCostTotal;
	
	    SET @levelIndex = @levelIndex - 1;
    END;

    SELECT MAX(PublishedBillingPeriod) AS PublishedBillingPeriod,
	    BillingPeriod,
	    MAX(FiscalYear) AS FiscalYear,
	    MAX(BillingMonth) AS BillingMonth,
	    AgencyCodeOEC,
	    MAX(AgencyName) AS AgencyName,
	    Cost,
	    SUM(RevisedBilledAmount) AS RevisedBilledAmount
    FROM @TableReturn
    GROUP BY BillingPeriod, AgencyCodeOEC, Cost
    ORDER BY AgencyCodeOEC, BillingPeriod, Cost;
END;
